final_answer:
The image humorously contrasts the idea of having tattoos with the reality of having hairy arms that obscure them. The left side shows a stylized figure with visible tattoos being the center of attention and admiration, represented by the applauding crowd. The text "YES," suggests approval or celebration of the tattoos.

The right side humorously undercuts this admiration with "BUT" and shows a realistic arm with hair obscuring any tattoos. This highlights the mundane and unexpected reality that can sometimes contrast with expectations, creating a satirical take on the situation where tattoos may not always be as visible or impressive due to natural factors like body hair.
ground_truth: The image is funny because while from the distance it seems that the man has big tattoos on both of his arms upon a closer look at the arms it turns out there is no tattoo and what seemed to be tattoos are just hairs on his arm.
